channel.title: Like bricks in the sky - home improvement

item.title: Patching a Mail Slot
item.description: The front door of my condo has an unused mail slot in it (we have a mailbox on the front of the house to actually get mail). In order to avoid a draft during the winter, the previous owner had shoved some insulation in the mail slot and covered it …
item.dc:creator: Patrick Cloke
